SELECT g.goods_num, g.goods_name, g.goods_price, g.goods_contents, g.visit_count, g.goods_main_image, g.goods_main_store_image, g.goods_detail_image, g.goods_detail_store_image, g.emp_num, g.goods_regist, g.update_emp_num, g.goods_update_date, SUM(i.ipgo_qty) AS total_qty FROM goods g LEFT JOIN goods_ipgo i ON g.goods_num = i.goods_num GROUP BY g.goods_num having g.goods_num=#{goodsNum}
